titles.title: To amend the National Sea Grant College Program Act with respect to the treatment of Lake Champlain.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries Conservation, Wildlife and Oceans.

bill.summary: 3/24/1998--Introduced. Amends the National Sea Grant College Program Act to include within the term "ocean, coastal, and Great Lakes resources" resources of Lake Champlain, to the extent such resources have hydrological, biological, physical, or geological characteristics and problems similar or related to those of the Great Lakes.
